UW Research Resources Resources Our most requested resources This page is divided into three sections: Popular Resources, PI Quick Links , and Collaboration . Popular Resources Forms and Templates : Forms, templates, and worksheets Glossary : Glossary of terms and acronyms Honors and Awards : Faculty memberships and awards Institutional Facts and Rates : Institutional codes, numbers, facts, & rates for UW research including items like Benefit Rates, Facilities & Administrative Rates, Contacts & Mailing Address, and more… Policies, Procedures, and Guidance : Listing of OR policies (including GIMs), procedures, and guidance Research Stats and Rankings : Stats, rankings, and research highlights Workday Finance & Research : Key information and resources to support the Research Community’s use of Workday Finance PI Quick Links Agreement Considerations : Negotiation, principles, and practice Funding Opportunities : Selection of internal and external funding opportunities Grants Information Memorandum (GIMs) : UW policies that apply to sponsored programs such as Review and Submission of Proposals, Internal Deadlines for Proposals to External Entities, and more… New to UW Research : Onboarding information and resources for doing research at the UW PI Resources Quick Start : Overview of resources for PIs Proposal Development Resources : Project Management Tools for Proposal Development Collaboration Agreement Types : Agreements related to research & sponsored activity Establish a Research Center or Institute : Procedures
